mapper.insert: insert into chat( chat_no, chat_room_no, chat_sender, chat_receiver, chat_content, attach_no ) values( #{chatNo}, #{chatRoomNo}, #{chatSender}, #{chatReceiver}, #{chatContent}, #{attachNo} )
mapper.select: select * from chat order by chat_no asc
SELECT * FROM chat WHERE chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo} ORDER BY chat_time asc
select CHAT_CONTENT from ( select CHAT_CONTENT from CHAT WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo} order BY CHAT_TIME DESC ) WHERE rownum = 1

SELECT m.chat_room_no, m.MEETING_NAME, m.MEETING_LOCATION, m.MEETING_DATE, m.MEETING_NO, c.CHAT_NO, c.CHAT_CONTENT, c.CHAT_SENDER, c.CHAT_TIME, c.ATTACH_NO, c.CHAT_BLIND, cm.JOIN_DATE FROM meeting m JOIN meeting_member mm ON m.meeting_no = mm.meeting_no JOIN club_member cm ON mm.club_member_no = cm.club_member_no JOIN CHAT_ROOM cr ON cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO = m.chat_room_no JOIN CHAT c ON c.CHAT_ROOM_NO = cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO WHERE cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo} AND c.CHAT_TIME >= cm.JOIN_DATE AND cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID = #{chatSender}

SELECT cm.CLUB_MEMBER_NO, cm.CLUB_NO, cm.CLUB_MEMBER_RANK, cm.JOIN_DATE , club.chat_room_no, chat.CHAT_NO, chat.CHAT_SENDER, chat.CHAT_RECEIVER, chat.CHAT_CONTENT, chat.CHAT_TIME, chat.ATTACH_NO, chat.chat_blind FROM club_member cm JOIN club ON cm.club_no = club.club_no JOIN chat ON club.chat_room_no = chat.chat_room_no WHERE chat.chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo} AND chat.chat_time >= cm.JOIN_DATE AND cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID = #{chatSender} ORDER BY chat.chat_time ASC

SELECT cm.CLUB_MEMBER_NO, cm.CLUB_NO, cm.CLUB_MEMBER_RANK, cm.JOIN_DATE, club.chat_room_no, chat.CHAT_NO, chat.CHAT_SENDER, chat.CHAT_RECEIVER, chat.CHAT_CONTENT, chat.CHAT_TIME, chat.ATTACH_NO FROM club_member cm JOIN club ON cm.club_no = club.club_no JOIN chat ON club.chat_room_no = chat.chat_room_no WHERE chat.chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo} AND chat.CHAT_TIME >= cm.JOIN_DATE AND chat.CHAT_TIME >= #{targetTime} AND cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID =#{chatSender} ORDER BY chat.chat_time ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE chat SET chat_blind = 'Y' WHERE chat_no = #{chatNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_BLIND FROM chat WHERE CHAT_no = #{chatNo}
